conclusion: Violation of Art. 8;Violation of Art. 13+8;Remainder inadmissible
docname: CASE OF VLADIMIR POLISHCHUK AND SVETLANA POLISHCHUK v. UKRAINE
issue: Article 440 of the Civil Code ; Act “On procedure for compensation for damage caused to citizens by the unlawful acts of bodies of inquiry, pre-trial investigation authorities, prosecutor’s offices and courts” of 1 December 1994
judges: Ganna Yudkivska;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
